snippet: Economic growth in the second quarter fell short of the previous three months’ figure and of analysts’ expectations, possibly threatening plans for shrinking the nation’s soaring debt.
abstract: Government data shows that Japan's economic growth slowed in second quarter to annualized rate of 2.6 percent; growth fell short of previous three months’ figure and of analysts’ expectations, possibly threatening plans for shrinking nation’s soaring debt.
lead_paragraph: Economic growth in the second quarter fell short of the previous three months’ figure and of analysts’ expectations, possibly threatening plans for shrinking the nation’s soaring debt.

headline.main: Economic Expansion Slows Down in Japan
headline.print_headline: Economic Expansion Slows Down In Japan
